description:
For the first time in Porto, there will be an Elixir community meetup. Bitmaker is organizing a fantastic event (Free Beer Included) for all the enthusiasts, for the experts as long as for the experts! 
SOLVING PROBLEMS WITH ELIXIR + PHOENIX
by Ricardo Fernandes 
The functional programming adoption is growing in the software industry. We all know that! In this meetup, Ricardo Fernandes from Bitmaker will showcase a few case studies of this type of programming, based on the Elixir language and the Phoenix framework. 
Three real projects where you can see the impact of Elixir in both business and technical challenges: a web platform for Call Centers, a service of event processing of soccer games, and a platform for content management.
name: Porto Elixir Meetup
